Diamond::

She smiled. "I am very good at getting into heavily guarded or 
secured areas." She handed Zardus a disk. "I got this from the 
Maximal councils sealed document files back on cybertron. Only the 
three head leaders where supposed to be able get access to these 
files. I managed to get them. They contain structual plans for bases 
and some new weapons designs. I hope they will be useful to you."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/FZ::
> 
> Zardus looks over at Delta, smiling slightly. "I have ways," he 
> replies, his wrist comp beeping with a report of gunfire near the 
new 
> ship.
> 
> He looks up from his wrist comp to Deemos. "Can you and your troops 
> go to the Oblitercons' position and back them up? They might be 
> running into some trouble.
> 
> He then recieves Diamond's transition, replying to it. "I might 
have 
> a job for you, yes.... How good are you at getting in and out of 
> places undetected? Places that might be very heavily guarded."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> FZ shakes his head. "That won't me neccessary, no."
> 
> He raises his head as he recieves an update on Zardus' mind from 
the 
> IF, heading off toward the exit.
> 
> "Follow me, you might be needed outside."
